column1: Smoque BBQ////I had pretty high expectations coming here
column2: and I wasn't disappointed.  The line was rather long when we arrived (I came with a group of five at 7pm on a Saturday)
column3: but it moved quickly--I think we waited about 30 minutes to place our order
column4: and then the food came out another 15 minutes after that.  I was slightly worried that my group wouldn't get to sit together
column5: but the staff was really efficient at seating everyone at the long
